docs.lead_paragraph: A whopping $100 million tax payment to Pennsylvania by the estate of a conservative billionaire is a welcome addition to the state's strained finances, state officials said on Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Former President Bill Clinton urged voters in his home state Monday not to use the midterm election as a protest against the White House, as he toured the state to help Democrats' efforts to prevent a GOP takeover in Arkansas.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to hear the appeal of 10 people who tried to sue former Mexican President Ernesto Zedillo on allegations he bore some responsibility for a 1997 massacre in Mexico and tried to cover it up.

docs.abstract: The Appraisal column; Francis J Greenburger, New York City real estate developer, discusses plans to open Greenburger Center for Social and Criminal Justice, 25-bed facility offering alternative to incarceration for mentally ill in New York metropolitan area; Greenburger's interest in his latest commercial real estate project grew from his experience with mentally ill son, now serving five-year prison sentence for arson.

docs.snippet: With four weeks to go before the midterm elections, the battle for control of the Senate has narrowed to just a handful of races. And the shifting landscape in two of those contests — Iowa and North Carolina — captures how difficult it will be...
docs.abstract: With four weeks to go before the midterm elections, the battle for control of the Senate has narrowed to just a handful of races. And the shifting landscape in two of those contests — Iowa and North Carolina — captures how difficult it will be for Democrats to prevent a Republican takeover.

docs.lead_paragraph: An unlikely word, one intended to highlight superior methods, has become the center of a legal struggle between a management guru and a yogurt manufacturer.
docs.snippet: An unlikely word, one intended to highlight superior methods, has become the center of a legal struggle between a management guru and a yogurt manufacturer....
docs.abstract: Author and management guru Dov Seidman is suing Greek yogurt manufacturer Chobani, contending that use of the word 'how' in its advertisements has infringed on his trademark; Seidman's new book How: Why How We Do Anything Means Everything highlights concept that he and his company LRN have spent 10 years building.

headline.print_headline: If the Word ‘How’ Is Trademarked, Does This Headline Need a ™ ?
headline.seo: Chobani and Dov Seidman Wrestle Over Use of ‘How’ Trademark
headline.main: If the Word ‘How’ Is Trademarked, Does This Headline Need a ™?
